name: OTT details
description: Get Streaming details of Movie and TV Shows. We support 150+ Streaming platforms in US and India such as HBO, YouTube, Netflix , Primve Video, Hotstar, Hulu, etc . (use our OTT Providers endpoint to get the full list OTT providers we support) . In additon to streaming info we also provide basic details on any given movie title.

api_methods.name: Params
api_methods.description: Get array of values that can be used as params in Advanced Search .

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: input 'genre' or 'language' to get array of genre or languages that can be used as filter in advanced search .

utterances.utterance: Can you provide a list of genres available for filtering movies?
What languages can I use to filter TV shows?
I want to know the different genres I can use to search for films.
Could you tell me the available languages for movie filtering?
List all the genres that I can use to filter my movie search.
What are the language options for filtering TV shows?
Can you show me the genres available for advanced movie search?
I need a list of languages that can be used to filter TV shows.
What genres can I choose from when searching for movies?
Could you provide the languages available for filtering movies?
